title: Dotted Font
content:
Hi there,

anyone any idea what font (used for "2009") that could be?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621164814im_/http:/typophile.com/files/screen-capture_5579.jpg)

Or similar fonts?

thanks very much!
author: flabrea

comments.content:
Looks like Fortuna Dot by Harold's Fonts

You can get it here: [http://www.fontbros.com/cgi-bin/commerce.cgi?preadd=action&key=HAFO-FODO](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621164814/http:/www.fontbros.com/cgi-bin/commerce.cgi?preadd=action&key=HAFO-FODO "http://www.fontbros.com/cgi-bin/commerce.cgi?preadd=action&key=HAFO-FODO")

Best,  
Stuart
